entry.name: pageloadfailed
entry.title: pageloadfailed
entry.desc: Triggered if the page load request failed.

longdesc.strong: Note: The triggering of this event is deprecated as of jQuery Mobile 1.4.0. It will no longer be triggered in 1.5.0.
longdesc.p: The replacement for is pagecontainerloadfailed. In jQuery Mobile 1.4.0, the two events are identical except for their name.
